title: Beginnings
description: Gobo's Uncle Matt discovers the opening to Outer Space and sets off to explore it, leaving Gobo behind to explore Fraggle Rock and pick up the postcards Matt will send.

title: Wembley and the Gorgs
description: Wembley agrees with everyone, including the Gorgs, who decide he makes a great loyal subject.

title: Let the Water Run
description: Red's Swimming Extravaganza is canceled when the Pool goes dry and there's no water to fill it

title: You Can't Do That Without a Hat
description: Boober is really brave until he loses his lucky hat.

title: The Thirty-Minute Work Week
description: Wembley has to decide what job he wants to do.

title: The Preachification of Convincing John
description: Mokey decides that eating Doozer constructions hurts their feelings, so she gets Convincing John to help her get the Fraggles to stop.

title: I Want to Be You
description: Everyone loves Mokey, so Red decides to be just like her.

title: The Terrible Tunnel
description: Wembley accidentally finds the legendary Terrible Tunnel.

title: The Lost Treasure of the Fraggles
description: Gobo and Red find a map that leads to the Ancient Treasure of the Fraggles.

title: Don't Cry Over Spilt Milk
description: Gobo gets trapped in Outer Space when Doc boards up the hole in the wall

title: Catch the Tail by the Tiger
description: When Gobo has not received his usual postcard from his Uncle Traveling Matt, he eventually comes to realize that he must venture into Outer Space to look for him - a trip that would terrify any of the Fraggles!

title: The Finger of Light
description: The World's Oldest Fraggle introduces the Fraggles to a dangerous new game: they pass over the dreaded Echo Hole, to a special room where the Finger of Light chooses a ruler for the Fraggles. Will the new ruler find out that power is tougher to handle than the Echo Hole?

title: We Love You, Wembley
description: Wembley falls in love with a Fraggle named Lou. But are Wembley's feelings for real or is he under a different influence? It's hard to tell because Marjory the Trash Heap gave him a love potion!

title: The Challenge
description: Gobo has always been the leader of the Fraggle gang, but when Red challenges him, they both get trapped by Junior Gorg, and Junior winds up in danger of losing both his ears - and his life!

title: I Don't Care
description: Boober is given a lucky charm by the Trash Heap, which is accidentally destroyed by the others. When the trouble from the accident gets out of control, the Fraggles must take it to the highest most important court in the land!

title: Capture the Moon
description: The Fraggles set out to capture the full moon, the wonderous shining object that floats in their pond once every month. It starts out as just a game, until they actually capture it! But, can you ever really capture the moon?

title: Marooned
description: Boober finds himself trapped in a cave-in with Red. But since the two of them have never gotten along too well, discovering that they may die together is kind of a shock! And on top of it all, it's also Boober's birthday!

title: The Minstrels
description: A band of Traveling Musicians comes to Fraggle Rock to present an ancient Fraggle tradition - the Medley. When Red gets carried away in her desire to participate and steals the Musicians' magic pipe, will the Medley ever be presented?

title: The Great Radish Famine
description: When all the radishes suddenly disappear from the Gorgs' garden, the civilization of Fraggle Rock nearly comes to an end. Can they find a way to regrow the radishes and can the Fraggles and Gorgs work together to accomplish the task?

title: The Garden Plot
description: Junior Gorg tries to get back in his father's good graces by tidying up the garden -- starting with the destruction of Fraggle Rock!

title: Gobo's Discovery
description: Gobo decides to give up exploring until an invisible monster moves into Fraggle Rock. Is he brave enough to find the monster and save his Fraggle friends from destruction?

title: Mokey's Funeral
description: Mokey conceives a clever plot to fool Junior Gorg. Her friends are not sure it's so clever when they witness Junior conducting a burial service for their friend. Has Mokey gone too far?

title: The Beast of Bluerock
description: Wembley Fraggle has a major falling out with his best friend Gobo - and then, with their friendship on the rocks, Wembley must follow him on an incredible adventure into the lair of a mythical, fearsome beast!

title: New Trash Heap in Town
description: Mokey Fraggle goes off alone one night to paint a picture of a rare cave creature. When she returns at dawn, she discovers that all the Fraggles now consider her their oracle: Mokey is the new Trash Heap!

title: Wembley's Egg
description: A giant egg from the Gorg's garden lands in the middles of Fraggle Rock, and Wembley decides to hatch it.

title: Boober Rock
description: Boober gets tired of all the noise and activity of Fraggle Rock and runs away to find peace and quiet.

title: The Trash Heap Doesn't Live Here Anymore
description: The Gorgs move the Trash Heap, and the Fraggles discover their source of wisdom is not quite the same anymore.

title: Red's Sea Monster
description: Red discovers a giant sea monster living in Fraggle Rock, but no one believes her.

title: Uncle Matt Comes Home
description: Uncle Traveling Matt comes back from Outer Space to spend some time with his nephew Gobo.

title: Boober's Dream
description: Boober dreams about a strange Fraggle named Sidebottom who turns out to be more than just a dream.

title: Mokey and the Minstrels
description: The Minstrels return to Fraggle Rock and Mokey leaves her friends to join them as their guest.

title: All Work and All Play
description: Cotterpin Doozer decides she'd rather be a Fraggle, like Red, than spend the rest of her life building with the Doozers.

title: Sir Hubris and the Gorgs
description: The Fraggles play a trick on the Gorgs. It works perfectly - until the whole thing backfires.

title: A Friend in Need
description: Sprocket gets stuck in the hole between Doc's workshop and Fraggle Rock, and Gobo has to help him escape.

title: The Wizard of Fraggle Rock
description: A wizard comes to Fraggle Rock who looks exactly like Wembley, except that he has a beard. He and Wembley agree to change places for one day because they are both dissatisfied with their lives.

title: The Doozer Contest
description: An argument between Flange and Modem Doozer turns into a Doozer duel and causes a crisis in Fraggle Rock.

title: Red's Club
description: Red decides to start a club of her own. But the only other member she can find is Cotterpin Doozer.

title: The Secret of Convincing John
description: Wembley, who never can make up his mind about anything, meets Convincing John and suddenly becomes the most decisive Fraggle in the world.

title: Manny's Land of Carpets
description: A transistor radio finds its way into the Rock and the Fraggles decide to pack up and move to the Promised Land - a cut-rate carpet store.

title: Junior Sells the Farm
description: Junior Gorg meets a fast-talking salesman who offers him the mythical "Peas of Power" in exchange for the family castle.

title: Fraggle Wars
description: Mokey discovers another tribe of Fraggles who live in a far corner of Fraggle Rock.

title: The Day the Music Died
description: Gobo is trying to write a song commemorating his Uncle Traveling Matt. But, suddenly, the light disappears in Fraggle Rock.

title: Doomsday Soup
description: Boober invents a soup which can make Fraggles invisible - but it can also blow up Fraggle Rock!

title: A Cave of One's Own
description: Red and Mokey decide to share a cave, but during their cave-warming party, they get into the worst fight of their lives.

title: Wembley and the Great Race
description: Wembley and Gobo's friendship is strained to the breaking point when they find themselves competing in a big race.

title: Doozer Is as Doozer Does
description: Wrench Doozer wants to be part of the best Doozer squad around - even if it means flopping, an activity which is dangerous for Doozers and the Dome they live in.

title: Boober's Quiet Day
description: Boober Fraggle tries to have a quiet day, but his alter-ego Sidebottom shows up to make sure he doesn't.

title: The Invasion of the Toe Ticklers
description: When the furry little Toe-Ticklers come to Fraggle Rock, Mokey decides to make them stay so that the Fraggles can be tickled forever. But the Toe-Ticklers start to change and the Fraggle's laughter turns to panic.

title: The Bells of Fraggle Rock
description: It's time for the Festival of the Bells, but the holiday has lost its meaning for Gobo.

title: Red Handed and Invisible Thief
description: Someone has stolen Red's Radish Bars and she's going to find the thief if it's the last thing she does!

title: Boober and the Glob
description: Boober's escape from Joke Day is interrupted by the appearance of a large pink glob in the Great Hall

title: The Grapes of Generosity
description: Gobo finds some Grapes of Generosity and soon discovers he's not as generous as he thought.

title: Blanket of Snow, Blanket of Woe
description: Mokey makes way too many promises to keep and quickly forgets most of them, especially one to knit a new tarpaulin for the Trash Heap before the first snow falls.

title: Pebble Pox Blues
description: Wembley and Boober must travel to the Cave of Shadows in order to find a cure for Gobo's Pebble Pox.

title: Home Is Where the Trash Is
description: Philo and Gunge decide to go home. If only they knew where it was!

title: Believe It or Not
description: Red and Wembley find a creature who can be whatever anyone believes he is, but when the Gorgs think there's a monster in the basement, things get ugly.

title: Wembley and the Mean Genie
description: Wembley discovers a magic bottle, but the Genie inside is a mean one.

title: The Secret Society of Poohbahs
description: Red thinks Mokey is taking an invitation to join the Secret Society of Poohbahs way too seriously.

title: The Beanbarrow, the Burden and the Bright Bouquet
description: Plans get changed when an emergency crops up for the team of Red and Mokey during the All-Day, Cross-Cave Beanbarrow Finals.

title: Gobo's School for Explorers
description: Gobo decides to start a school for explorers. On their first journey, Gobo blindly follows Matt's instructions and ignores his own instincts, to the detriment of all..

title: Scared Silly
description: Boober is testing beluviouses (Fraggle tails, which flair out when a Fraggle is scared). Wembley wants to get even and scare Boober back, but things go too far... or do they?

title: The Great Radish Caper
description: Junior Gorg's only friend is a huge radish named Geraldine, a fact which he discovers thanks to Mokey.

title: Born to Wander
description: The Storyteller tells the story of how Traveling Matt became an explorer.

title: The Battle of Leaking Roof
description: Ma wants Pa Gorg to fix the hole in the roof before the storm comes, but Pa is afraid of heights (though he won't admit it).

title: Playing Till It Hurts
description: Red escapes from her sickbed to play hockey before her visiting sports idol, Rock Hockey Hannah.

title: Bored Stiff
description: Pa Gorg decides to rid his and Ma's "Kissing Rock" of Fraggles once and for all with the Boredom Juice that Junior found, but things go horribly wrong.

title: The Cavern of Lost Dreams
description: Cotterpin Doozer gets Gobo to help her find the Cavern of Lost Dreams, the original Doozer cave.

title: The Incredible Shrinking Mokey
description: When Mokey befriends a magical creature named Begoony, she finds his demands on her to be too great.

title: A Dark and Stormy Night
description: Ma and Pa Gorg go on an overnight trip, leaving Junior alone in the castle for the first time. Meanwhile, Gobo thinks that all the Gorgs have gone on vacation, so he decides to explore their castle.

title: Gunge the Great and Glorious
description: When the Doozers think Gunge is their long lost king, his relationship with Philo is in jeopardy.

title: Sprocket's Big Adventure
description: After Doc pulls up the floorboards in the workshop, Sprocket enters Fraggle Rock.

title: Wembley's Wonderful Whoopie Water
description: Wembley uses his acute hearing to detect delicious whoopee water. But using the water endangers the Rock.

title: Sidebottom Blues
description: Boober lets Sidebottom turn him into Dr. Fun when he thinks his friends don't like him because he's no fun.

title: Uncle Matt's Discovery
description: While Uncle Matt is back for a visit, he discovers a cavern with magical transporting archways.

title: Junior Faces the Music
description: Cantus the Minstrel arrives to help Junior Gorg with the ritual of the Royal Kazoo.

title: A Tune for Two
description: Wembley causes a stir when he pairs with Cotterpin Doozer in the Duet-a-thon.

title: The Perfect Blue Rollie
description: Wembley and Boober find a legendary Perfect Blue Rollie, which Boober doesn't want to share.

title: A Brush with Jealousy
description: Mokey gets a magic paintbrush from the Trash Heap, but uses it for the wrong reasons.

title: Wembley's Flight
description: Wembley rescues a spiderfly which turns out to be magic. It grants him a wish, so Wembley decides to be able to fly.

title: Red's Blue Dragon
description: Red goes through a tunnel in the T. Matthew Fraggle Room and finds a blue dragon.

title: Wonder Mountain
description: Red follows Mokey on her solo trip to Wonder Mountain to make sure she's ok, but of course it's Red who falls victim to almost every pitfall on the Wonder Trail.

title: Space Frog Follies
description: Uncle Matt has gotten Gobo a frog from Outer Space for his birthday, but when it gets loose while Wembley is supposed to be hiding it, things get really crazy!

title: Boober Gorg
description: After being hit on the head by an exploding radish, Boober gets amnesia and thinks he's a Gorg. When he tells Ma and Pa Gorg, they believe him, because they think a sorceror has changed Junior, who is missing, into a Fraggle.

title: Mirror, Mirror
description: It's Red's 28th birthday in a row since the Festival of the Bells when she finds a magic mirror (named Mavis) that leads her to a very special birthday party.

title: The Riddle of Rhyming Rock
description: Gobo tries to solve the riddle of Rhyming Rock.

title: The Voice Inside
description: Sprocket visits Fraggle Rock and goes on a trip with Gobo and Wrench Doozer.

title: The Trial of Cotterpin Doozer
description: Cotterpin Doozer is accused of consorting with Fraggles, and she must prove that Fraggles are noble and intelligent and worthy of the respect of the Doozers.

title: The River of Life
description: When Fraggle Rock's water supply is contaminated by the Silly Creatures, only Boober can save the day.

title: Beyond the Pond
description: Red and Gobo's swimming competition is interrupted by the annual arrival of the Knobblies, pink vine-like plants which are particularly thick this year, and which turn out to lead to something quite unexpected.

title: Gone But Not Forgotten
description: On his first solo overnight hike, Wembley meets Mudwell the Mudbunny, whose behavior first entertains, and then confuses him.

title: Mokey, Then and Now
description: Mokey, Wembley and Boober get transported back in time, to an era when Fraggles are bald, have leaders, and never laugh.

title: Ring Around the Rock
description: It's Ma and Pa Gorg's 513th anniversary, and they must get married again. But where's the ring?

title: Inspector Red
description: The Fraggle Horn is missing, and Red tries to find it, accusing many along the way.

title: The Gorg Who Would Be King
description: The leaves of the Nirvana tree have fallen, and it's time for Junior Gorg to become king, but not until he has a chance to get a different perspective on the Universe.

title: The Honk of Honks
description: Cantus and the Minstrels are back and ready to perform the Song of Songs, but first Gobo must find the Honk of Honks. Along the way, he meets Doc face to face for the first time.

title: Change of Address
description: Doc finally knows of the Fraggles, when he and Sprocket have to move. Will Gobo be able to relay the Trash Heap's message "You cannot leave the magic" in time?
